pages.title: Imbued
pages.text: Imbued is a runic power that imbues the wielder's weapon with the $(#389fff)$(l)essence of magic$(). $(br2)It provides a weapon with the ability to lash out with a potent magical energy when hitting enemies.
The magical damage dealt by Imbued is often unpredictable, and tends to wane as the weapon suffers durability damage. Keeping the Imbued weapon repaired would be wise.
